snippet: Paul Stastny scored on a deflection with 5 minutes 54 seconds left to lift the St. Louis Blues to a 4-3 win at home over the Nashville Predators.
abstract: St Louis Blues defeat Nashville Predators, 4-3; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Paul Stastny scored on a deflection with 5 minutes 54 seconds left to lift the St. Louis Blues to a 4-3 win at home over the Nashville Predators.

headline.main: St. Louis Blues Win at Home Against Nashville Predators
